lead_paragraph: Russian swimming chief Vladimir Salnikov said on Tuesday the hostile atmosphere surrounding his Olympic team reminded him of the Cold War as sport, drugs and politics formed a toxic mix that is souring the mood of the Rio Games.

headline.print_headline: Jeers, Drug Rows and Cold War Echoes Mar Rio Mood
headline.main: Jeers, Drug Rows and Cold War Echoes Mar Rio Mood

snippet: Russian swimming chief Vladimir Salnikov said on Tuesday the hostile atmosphere surrounding his Olympic team reminded him of the Cold War as sport, drugs and politics formed a toxic mix that is souring the mood of the Rio Games....
